title: Brand Strategist
description:
BrandVibe Agency is Hiring a Brand Strategist (Full-Time)

BrandVibe Agency, a Johannesburg-based firm, builds brand narratives for clients in retail and education. We’re seeking an Brand Strategist to craft compelling strategies.

Role Summary
You’ll develop brand positioning to drive engagement.

Key Duties
- Conduct market research.
- Develop brand positioning.
- Collaborate for campaigns.
- Analyze brand performance.
- Present strategies to clients.
- Create messaging frameworks.
- Stay updated on brand trends.
- Support client meetings.
- Contribute to brand audits.
- Share team insights.

Qualifications
We need candidates with 3–5 years of experience in brand strategy, with strong research and campaign development skills. Excellent presentation and storytelling abilities are essential. A Bachelor’s degree in marketing or a related field is required.

Why BrandVibe?
We value creativity and strategy. Our hybrid work model and training support growth in a collaborative environment.

Perks
Medical aid
Performance bonuses
20 days of annual leave
Training budget
Research tools access
Team events

Apply Now
Join BrandVibe Agency to shape brand stories. Submit your application today!
